name: Pricing & Subscriptions
description: Dynamic pricing, subscription economics, and revenue optimization — price elasticity estimation and causal inference form the core toolkit

resources.name: Coursera Pricing Strategy Optimization (UVA/BCG)
resources.why: Price elasticity, WTP estimation, segmentation — free to audit

resources.name: Maven: The Art of SaaS Pricing
resources.why: Usage-based pricing and Good-Better-Best from Ajit Ghuman

resources.name: Monetizing Innovation (Ramanujam)
resources.why: The industry bible — design products around price, not vice versa

resources.name: Lenny's Podcast: Madhavan Ramanujam
resources.why: 90 minutes on WTP conversations and behavioral pricing

packages.name: EconML
packages.why: Heterogeneous treatment effects — built by Microsoft for economists

packages.name: CausalML
packages.why: Uber's uplift modeling for price optimization

packages.name: DoWhy
packages.why: Causal graph framework with refutation tests

name: Ads & Auctions
description: Mechanism design and auction theory in industry — economists with game theory backgrounds have direct advantages here

resources.name: Twenty Lectures on Algorithmic Game Theory
resources.why: Bridges CS and economics with ad case studies

resources.name: Display Advertising with Real-Time Bidding
resources.why: Free comprehensive RTB coverage on arXiv

resources.name: GSP Auction Paper (Edelman et al., AER 2007)
resources.why: Foundational paper on search advertising auctions

resources.name: AdKDD Workshop Papers
resources.why: Applied research from Google, Meta, Amazon

packages.name: PyMC-Marketing
packages.why: Bayesian MMM with adstock and saturation

name: Marketing Analytics
description: CLV modeling, attribution, and retention analytics — economists' panel data experience transfers directly to cohort analysis

resources.name: PyMC-Marketing CLV Quickstart
resources.why: CLV basics, RFM analysis, BG/NBD models — free official docs

packages.name: lifelines
packages.why: Survival analysis for retention and churn

name: Risk, Safety & Trust
description: Fraud detection, credit risk, and trust & safety ML — causal inference handles adversarial, imbalanced problems

resources.name: GeeksforGeeks: Credit Card Fraud Detection
resources.why: Supervised/unsupervised ML for imbalanced data — free tutorial

resources.name: 365 Data Science: Credit Risk Modeling
resources.why: PD, LGD, EAD with Basel compliance

resources.name: Fight Fraud with ML (Manning, 2024)
resources.why: Phishing, card fraud, deepfakes, graph CNNs

packages.name: scorecardpy
packages.why: WOE binning, IV calculation for credit

packages.name: optbinning
packages.why: ING Bank's optimal binning for scorecards

name: Recommendation Systems
description: Random utility models underpin collaborative filtering — preference elicitation mirrors revealed preference theory

resources.name: Practical Recommender Systems (Manning)
resources.why: Python implementations from baselines to transformers

resources.name: Deep Learning for Choice Modeling
resources.why: Bridges economic choice theory with deep learning

name: Search & Ranking
description: Learning-to-rank combines ML with causal inference — counterfactual learning addresses position bias like selection bias correction

resources.name: Learning to Rank for IR (Tie-Yan Liu)

packages.name: FAISS
packages.why: Facebook's vector similarity search at scale

name: Logistics & Supply Chain
description: Operations research for routing, inventory, and demand forecasting — constrained optimization and dynamic programming

resources.name: MIT MicroMasters: Supply Chain (edX)
resources.why: Graduate-level demand forecasting, inventory, network design

name: Financial Data Science
description: Quantitative finance applies economists' time series econometrics — GARCH models, portfolio theory, and risk metrics

resources.name: ML for Algorithmic Trading (Jansen)
resources.why: Comprehensive Python from scikit-learn to RL

resources.name: Advances in Financial ML (Lopez de Prado)

name: Growth Data Science
description: Growth loops, funnel analysis, and experimentation — diff-in-diff and regression discontinuity power incrementality testing

resources.name: Reforge: Growth Foundations
resources.why: Industry gold standard on retention, engagement, acquisition

resources.name: KDnuggets: A/B Testing in Python
resources.why: Experiment design with scipy, statsmodels — free complete guide
